XMPP Intermediate Client 2008 This document defines the XMPP Intermediate Client 2008 compliance level. &LEGALNOTICE; 0213 Experimental Standards Track Standards
XMPP Core XMPP IM XEP-0045 XEP-0071 XEP-0085

0.1 2007-04-20 psa
Initial published version.
0.0.1 2007-03-30 psa First draft, split from XEP-0117.

section1.p: The &XSF; defines protocol suites for the purpose of compliance testing and software certification. This document specifies the XMPP Intermediate Client 2008 certification level.
The XMPP Intermediate Client 2008 certification level is defined as follows:
Note: These protocols have their own dependencies, which include the following XEPs (as well as various IETF RFCs and W3C specifications):
This document introduces no additional security considerations above and beyond those defined in the documents on which it depends.
This document requires no interaction with &IANA;.
This document requires no interaction with the ®ISTRAR;.
